channel.title: How to add custom items on a HD Client?
channel.description:
EDIT: Wrong section please move!
I'm using tokkulscape v3.5 and I converted it into HD but I had a problem with customs I downloaded Josh's HD client I think, but it doesn't have any java files, just class files. So without the java files I don't know how to add customs to it.... I've googled,seached mopar and other sites but I don't end up with much help
